title: Game developer - Freelance
description:
I used to develop games with Unity (C#), from simple simulation to complex 2D strategies (some samples are availible on my GitHub).
	During that time I've learnt a lot about OOP, C#, algorithms and data structures.

title: .Net Developer - Elettric80
description:
I mainly develop WPF MVVM applications and connect it to the SQL SERVER database using EntityFramework and DataBase First approach.
	Most of the project is developed in group, where show good soft and lidership skills.
	Our team uses SCRUM methodology during project development.
	Also I setup tools for monitoring, collecting, and visualisation system data using Grafana and Prometheus.
